ir.taghizadeh.tehran.dependencies.authentication

Class AuthenticationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.taghizadeh.tehran.dependencies.authentication.AuthenticationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authentication

    public class AuthenticationImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authentication

    AuthenticationImpl

    The main logic about Firebase authentication is done here and we can have access to these methods with Authentication interface which is injected into AuthenticationModuleActivity.

    Since:
    2019-01-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ali Taghizadeh Gevari

      • addAuthStateListener

        public void addAuthStateListener()
        This method is called in onResume() within AuthenticationModuleActivity
        Specified by:
        addAuthStateListener in interface Authentication

      • attachAuthListener

        public void attachAuthListener()
        This method is called in the constructor. First it checks authentication state. if user is valid it passes its username and photoURL to our predefined interfaces to attach them to UI. But if user is invalid, Firebase Auth UI comes in and starts an activity and asks the user to register with email or Google account. By extending AuthenticationModuleActivity this method will be called.
        Specified by:
        attachAuthListener in interface Authentication

      • removeAuthStateListener

        public void removeAuthStateListener()
        This method is called in onPause() within AuthenticationModuleActivity
        Specified by:
        removeAuthStateListener in interface Authentication

      • updatePhotoURL

        public void updatePhotoURL(android.net.Uri photoURL)
        By calling this method Firebase Auth, updates the user profile with a UserProfileChangeRequest instance. When it's done, our listener will notify that the update is done successfully.
        Specified by:
        updatePhotoURL in interface Authentication
        Parameters:
        photoURL - This is the URL of the uploaded avatar in FireBase storage
